mapper.insert: insert into db_teacher (id, name, college, updatetime) values (student.id, student.name, student.college, student.updatetime)
mapper.select: select t.tname '教师名',t.company '所属院系',count(*) '开课数' from db_student s,db_course c,db_teacher t,db_studcour sc where s.sno = #{username} and s.sno = sc.sno and sc.cno = c.cno and c.tno = t.tno group by c.tno;
